name: Ultimate Blackball
description:
Ultimate Blackball is a simple and addictive hyper-casual game that anyone can play.
How to play:
This is a parkour game
Click to change direction, avoid abyssal objects and collect blocks to reach the top of the finish line
Collect as many points as possible
Please be careful to change the direction of the ball
Game contains:
The difficulty of the game increases over time
The game is in the development stage, and new gameplay and modes will be added in the future
